name: Jagged
desc: Sharp spires of earth and stone make traveling through this space painful.
effect: Anytime a creature enters a Jagged space or ends a turn there they immediately take 2 Stab Damage and gain _Bleed_ 1 [_Avoidable_]. If they end a _Jump_ in this space, they instead take 3 Stab Damage and gain _Bleed_ 2 [_Avoidable_]. An individual space may only effect a creature once per _Turn_.

name: Normal
desc: An unremarkable space with no notable features to speak of.

name: Fortified
desc: A piece of terrain that, while not providing cover, provides some form of defense.
effect: Creatures have +1 _Guard_ while in a Fortified space. A creature may only benefit from a single Fortified space at a time.

name: Rough
desc: Ground full of unsure footing and low obstacles that makes traveling through it difficult.
effect: Rough spaces costs twice as much Movement to move through.

name: Rushing Water
desc: Terrain that represents a rapids or similarly fast-moving body of water.
effect: Characters must _Swim_ through this Terrain. Running Water has a direction. At the end of each even _Phase_, inflict _Push_ 1 in the direction of the Running Water on all creatures in it. When a creature enters _Running Water_ or ends their _Turn_ in it, inflict _Soaked_.

name: Running Water
desc: Terrain that represents a slow-moving body of water.
effect: Characters must _Swim_ through this Terrain and gain _Soaked_ when they enter this space.

name: Shallow Water
desc: Terrain that represents water that is deep enough that a creature must wade through it, but not deep enough to swim.
effect: Movement through this _Terrain_ costs twice as much. If a creature becomes _Prone_ in this space they gain _Soaked_. If _Destroyed_, this space becomes _Wet_.

name: Deep Water
desc: Terrain that represents still water that a creature must swim in.
effect: Characters must _Swim_ through this Terrain and gain _Soaked_ when they enter this space. When _Destroyed_, this space becomes _Shallow Water_.

name: Waterfall
desc: An elevation change in running water that is dangerous to pass through.
effect: Waterfalls have all the same effects as _Running Water_. In addition, characters may not _Swim_ through these spaces and, when a character enters this space, they immediately take 4 _Crush_ Damage and gain _Dazed_ 1 (1 _Grit_).

name: Veiled
effect: Veiled Terrain is filled with dust, smoke, mist, or some other obscuring agent. A creature in a Veiled space is _Obscured_. Treat Veiled Spaces as an Obstacle when determining the Attack Line, but they may never cause a creature to be _Covered_.
interacts: <ins>Windy:</ins> Veiled may not be created in this space.

name: Wet
desc: Terrain with standing water that limits a stable footing.
effect:
While on Wet _Terrain_ a creature suffers the following effects:
* Increase the cost to negate all _Forced Movement_ effects by 1.
* Increase the cost to negate all _Prone_ effects inflicted on them by 1.
* A creature that starts their _Turn_ in this space loses a single space of Movement.

name: Toxic Gas
effect: Creatures that end their _Turn_ in a space with this _Terrain_ gain _Impaired_ 1 and take 2 _Poison_ Damage. Additionally, treat this space as _Veiled_.
